title: Why are Google products increasing day by day? - Quora

response.answer_text: Firs Google products are not increasing day by day. Google are not known for innovation, they are known for trying to move people into their marketing space under the pretext of ‘Do no evil’ - where they can then monetise you. The attempts that google have tried at innovation such as Google Glass (where the wearers became known as ‘glass-holes’, and their attempts to take on Facebook - have been absolutely spectacular failures.
